revised_title: Exploring Roman Colonies and Stations in Cheshire and Lancashire
tldr: The author examines the locations and routes of Roman colonies and stations in Cheshire and Lancashire, providing insights into the historical geography and archaeology of the region. The author discusses the debate over the location of Condate and identifies Kinderton as the most likely site. The article also explores the Roman fort at Manchester and the surrounding area, including the Roman road network and various historical sites.
